column5: oh GOD the kiss of death they have been wrong on their predictions for many years if they say hot summer it's cold
Lets hope they're right on this one!!  Bring on the ice  Sinker
Break out the ice fishing gear....winter is coming!!!  I need to find a Clam fast.   http://www.accuweather.com/canada-forecast...ic=1&set=99  Jason

I talked with a North American Indian Elder last week and he also told me that it was going to be a long cold Winter, so I asked him how he knew that.  He replied  " White man cut lotsa wood this year."
Woo Hoooo, bring on the ice!!
Y'all aint right... yanno that eh?

Well i wish that they would make up their minds...man on global news their prediction was for a warmer january & febuary !!!! with november & december being below normal temps...so far they are right about november it has been several degrees colder than normal,so maybe they will be right we will have wait & see !!!!...dam i havnt even put my boat away yet.....cheers
lol  Ya but we get to cuddle more!
